00044 class SamplingLikelihood : public LikelihoodType
00045 {
00046 public:
00047     // Default constructor - using identity observation operator (or transform)
00048         SamplingLikelihood();
00049

00065         //                                    double ModelVariance, double obsOperator(double) ) const = 0;
00066
